definition: new generation of youths (generation X, Y etc)
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: The "New Human" refers to the young about 20 years old.
sentences.chinese: “新新人類”是指現今20歲左右的青年。

sentences.english: When did the term of new-new people come into being?
sentences.chinese: “新新人類”這一詞彙是什麼時候出現的？

sentences.english: When did the term of new-new people come into being, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問“新新人類”一詞是什麼時候纔出現的呢？

sentences.english: Let us look at one of these new generation to the latest housing requirements.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們一起來看看這些新新人類的買房最新要求。

sentences.english: A series of literary works by the X Generation have been published in the paper. They are quite popular.
sentences.chinese: 報紙選登了一批新新人類的文學作品，很有人氣。
